name: LostRoom (Indie_RU)
description:
Support This Game

LostRoom - is a short first person horror game.

You were left at home alone. Are you sure there is no one else here?

W/A/S/D - walk
E/LMB - interact
Left Shift - run
Left CTRL - crouch
F - flashlight (if you have)
L - lighter (if you have)
